Converting currency from dollar to nepali
```{r}
Dollar<-rpois(20,60)
df1<-data.frame(Dollar)
nepali <- function(Dollar){
  df1$Rupees <- df1$Dollar * 120 #the value of 1 dollar is equal to 120 nepali rupees
  return(df1)
}
nepali(df1)
```
Converting rupees into dollar
```{r}
dollar_converter <- function(rupees) {
  dollar <- rupees / 120
  return(dollar)
}
dollar_converter(12000)
```
